## Introduction to R & RStudio {#introduction-to-r-rstudio}

### Advantage of using R

-   Open-source with a large and constantly growing community of users

-   Explicitly document analysis step-by-step such that it is easy to update and to expand

-   Easily re-use code for similar applications with different data

-   Fully reproducible, which makes it straightforward for others to comprehend and validate results

### RStudio on GEMS Platform

GEMS Platform has built-in support for R and RStudio for subscribed GEMS users.

To use RStudio on GEMS Platform, from GEMS Platform homepage, click `ANALYZE > RStudio`
